description: TVM is a full stack open deep learning compiler stack for CPUs, GPUs, and specialized accelerators. It aims to close the gap between the productivity-focused deep learning frameworks, and the performance- or efficiency-oriented hardware backends.
mentor: Byung-Gon Chun, Sebastian Schelter, Henry Saputra, Timothy Chen, Furkan Kamaci, Tianqi Chen, Markus Weimer
